text: (napiye!) Nuhukkum, avarukkup pinnar vanta napimarkalukkum nam vahyi arivittavare umakkum niccayamaka nam vahyi arivittom. Melum, iprahim, ismayil, is'hak, ya'akup akiyavarkalukkum, avarkalutaiya cantatikalukkum, isa, aiyup, yunus, harun, sulaiman akiyavarkalukkum (ivvare) nam vahyi arivittirukkirom. Tavutukku â€˜japur' ennum vetattai name kotuttom
